ARIMA models can be used for forecasting: Can ARIMA models be used for forecasting? ARIMA models forecasting applications
What Is ARIMA Used for? ARIMA is a method for forecasting or predicting future outcomes based on a historical time series.
Can ARIMA models be used for forecasting? ARIMA models forecasting applications

An ARIMA (Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average) model is a popular statistical method for time series forecasting that predicts future values by combining past observations (AR), differencing to achieve stationarity (I), and past errors to refine predictions (MA).
